articles.content: Europe is struggling to battle highly infectious mutations of Covid-19 which are changing the game across the continent. Video / APAs Europe struggles in its battle with coronavirus, a host of highly… [+3133 chars]
articles.description: Up to 75 per cent of cases in continental Europe are now the more contagious variant.
articles.title: Covid-19 coronavirus: Highly contagious mutations hit Europe - New Zealand Herald
